DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to study the effect of different levels of PEEP in ALI/ARDS patients on gas exchange.
DOC.brief_title: PEEP Test and Gas Exchange in ALI/ARDS Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In a population of ALI/ARDS patients during mechanical ventilation we will evaluate the effect of different levels of PEEP on gas exchange and dead space.
DOC.criteria: ALI/ARDS patients requiring mechanical ventilation Hemodynamic instability Barotrauma
